settings.name: My auxiliary behavioural models
settings.description: Models for performing the second-stage reclassification. The App expects a folder containing one file named 'modelfit.rds', generated by the speed-time-fit MoveApp.

settings.name: Insert mean hour of nightroost beginning
settings.description: Insert, in 24-hour integer format, the hour beyond which subjects are assumed to be nightroosting.

settings.name: Insert mean hour of nightroost ending
settings.description: Insert, in 24-hour integer format, the hour before which subjects are assumed to be nightroosting.

settings.name: Upper speed bound for 'stationary' beahviour
settings.description: Insert the upper cutoff for behaviour to be classified as 'stationary'.

references.note: Darwin, C. 1900. The creation. Journal XY. 1-2
